div.head: Description of changes for 2012.08
div.p: This is the first public version of this text. It is a first draft copied from a diplomatic transcription of the St. Victor manuscript. Corrections and additiooons will be made pending a comparision of available manuscript witnesses. Citations, cross-references, and a critical apparatus all await constructions.
